Really a good game. Graphics is dependent on network speed and quality of user pc thus you determine your graphic experience. I also like the quick action taken against hackers because lets all be honest hackers is quite a mood kill.
Would definitely buy prime status. It is not a PTW game which makes it more user-friendly for beginners or just casual players. 
Overall a brilliant game that i will definitely recommend to anyone interested in a quality fps game.
